title: Loot Inventory
body:
Long story short I had enough orange essence to unlock beast hunter draven and I accidentally disenchanted it. this happened on the 9th of february (for reference) and I was wondering if there was anyway i could recover it in exhange for the amount of essence i got for accidentally disenchanting,
thank you

replies.body:
Best thing you can do is submit a ticket to player support. I wouldn't get your hopes up, but they're the ones to ask :)

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
